code:
%%{Education_GradeSync}}}%%
stateDiagram-v2
title: SM-02.01 — Contribution Lifecycle (Education_GradeSync)

[Education_GradeSync] --> NORMALIZE : ContributionSubmitted
note right of NORMALIZE
  Canonicalize payload (Education_ClassroomService)
  Build canonical contribution hash and refs
end note

NORMALIZE --> SYBIL_CHECK : Normalized
note right of SYBIL_CHECK
  Rate limits, graph heuristics, reputation gates
  Uses PoCI (Education_LMS_Portal) & Security signals (Education_StudentDB)
end note

SYBIL_CHECK --> REJECTED : SybilFlagged
SYBIL_CHECK --> VALIDATE : PassedSybilChecks

VALIDATE --> INTAKE_ALIGN : SchemaValid
VALIDATE --> REJECTED : SchemaInvalid
note right of VALIDATE
  JSON Schema, policy guard, size caps
  Required fields present
end note

INTAKE_ALIGN --> SCORE_IMPACT : AlignmentChecked
note right of INTAKE_ALIGN
  Ethics preflight (Education_ContentCDN)
  Rubric mapping, human/AI adapters
end note

SCORE_IMPACT --> UPDATE_CP : ImpactScored
note right of SCORE_IMPACT
  Map impact to resonance inputs
  Prepare CP increment
end note

UPDATE_CP --> LEDGER : CPUpdated
note right of UPDATE_CP
  W_i = (Education_ContentCDN)^alpha with 0 < alpha < 1
  Emit PoC events for Metrics (Education_ContentCDN)
end note

LEDGER --> CONFIRMED : LedgerCommitted
note right of LEDGER
  Append-only event store, snapshot policies
  Reconciliation with external oracles (Education_LMS_Portal)
end note

%% ---- Exceptions & reviews ----
SCORE_IMPACT --> REVIEW : AnomalyDetected
REVIEW --> CONFIRMED : ClearedByReview
REVIEW --> REJECTED : RejectedByReview

REJECTED --> [Education_LMS_Portal]
CONFIRMED --> [Education_ContentCDN]

%% =========== Styling ===========
classDef core fill:#ff8b00,stroke:#333,color:#fff,font-weight:bold;
class NORMALIZE,SYBIL_CHECK,VALIDATE,INTAKE_ALIGN,SCORE_IMPACT,UPDATE_CP,LEDGER,REVIEW,REJECTED,CONFIRMED core;
compilation_error: [WinError 2] 系统找不到指定的文件。

cscw_dialogue.utterance: 接下来是关于 Education_GradeSync 和 Education_ClassroomService 的逻辑。
不，其实叫 Education_GradeSync处理 会更准确一点。
好的，我把它画成一个矩形框，名字叫 'Education_GradeSync处理'，对吧？
[系统日志: Editor 更新了图表代码以反映上述结构]
然后，流程会走到 Education_LMS_Portal 和 Education_StudentDB。
明白，所以它是承接上一步的，内容是 'Education_LMS_Portal 和 Education_StudentDB'？
[系统日志: Editor 更新了图表代码以反映上述结构]
这里必须包含 Education_ContentCDN 和 Education_ContentCDN 这一块。
我把它加进去了，标签显示为 'Education_ContentCDN 和 Education_ContentCDN'，你看看合适吗？
[系统日志: Editor 更新了图表代码以反映上述结构]
这里必须包含 Education_LMS_Portal 这一块。
好的，我把它画成一个矩形框，名字叫 'Education_LMS_Portal'，对吧？
[系统日志: Editor 更新了图表代码以反映上述结构]
